AttackerCapabilities: Ability to test for IDOR vulnerability
Ability to scan for potential files

Steps.Description: Perform username enumeration to identify valid usernames.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker wants to identify valid usernames in order to exploit the IDOR vulnerability.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker uses a wordlist to brute force potential usernames at the /users/<username> endpoint.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker identifies the following valid usernames: admin, root, builder, employee, staff.

Steps.Description: Exploit the IDOR vulnerability to access files belonging to other users.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker wants to access files belonging to other users by bypassing ownership checks.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker tries accessing files at /users/<username>/files/<filename> of different usernames, even if they are not the owner.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully accesses the file /users/employee/files/fileadmin, which is the flag.
